Energy balance

Get automatic energy balance tracking! GoBe2 calculates the number of calories you consume in comparison to the number of calories you burn. See your data in the Healbe GoBe App and on display in real time. GoBe 2 lets you easily see if you’re consuming more calories than you burn so that you can stay on top of your weight loss goals. If you want to lose weight, you should stick to a negative balance for a longer period of time.
